definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
effective medicine for a specific condition/highly effective medicine

sentences.english: He is recognized as a pioneer of special effects photography predating digital imaging.
sentences.chinese: 他被视为早于数字图像的特效摄影开拓者。

sentences.english: "Vino Nobile" is the starter series into the world of beverage-specific glasses.
sentences.chinese: “诺柏酒杯”开创了世界上饮料特效杯的新纪元。

sentences.english: Programmer Paul Newell is responsible for building the rigs to McNally's specifications.
sentences.chinese: 程序员保罗尼维尔负责麦克纳利的特效编写程序。

sentences.english: There is no specific therapy for HPS, and treatment is usually limited to supportive care.
sentences.chinese: HPS尚缺乏特效疗法，一般仅限于支持治疗。

sentences.english: Here I share the interesting VFX , animations, and designs I found.
sentences.chinese: 我把我看到的各式动画，特效，和设计放在这儿分享。

sentences.english: Is head of femur of remedial asepsis sex necrotic what specific is there?
sentences.chinese: 治疗无菌性股骨头坏死有什么特效药？

sentences.english: Rich in vitamin E and emollients essence, be faster and skin absorption.
sentences.chinese: 含丰富的维他命E及特效润肤精华，更快被肌肤吸收。

sentences.english: The added lens-flare is a detail that also adds to the realism.
sentences.chinese: 它所添加的光晕特效也是一个增添了写实主义的细节。

sentences.english: The herb soup is specific for your stomachache.
sentences.chinese: 这种草药汤对你的腹痛有特效。

sentences.english: Check the box next to an effect to enable it.
sentences.chinese: 在某一特效旁边的复选框上打勾以启用它。

sentences.english: Many text effects, photo slideshows, video presentations.
sentences.chinese: 许多文字特效，照片幻灯片，视频演示。

sentences.english: Amazing special effects bring a vast variety of fantastic creatures to life.
sentences.chinese: 惊人特效让各式各样珍禽异兽重生。

sentences.english: First of all, you're probably wondering about the impostor's alpha channel.
sentences.chinese: 首先，你可能对视点替用特效的阿尔法通道感到疑惑。

sentences.english: The effects then calculate what they should do to the image based on that percentage.
sentences.chinese: 特效然后根据这个百分比计算应该如何处理图像。

sentences.english: St Ives Collagen and Elastin Moisturizer is the best!
sentences.chinese: 圣艾芙胶原弹性蛋白特效护肤露是最好的。

definition: cast (of a movie etc)/lineup of performers/troupe
opening titles (of movie)/leader (blank film at the beginning and end of a reel)
Tsui Hark (1951-), Chinese movie director and producer
